name: Firewall Dragon
desc:
Link Markers: Left, Top, Right, Bottom

2+ monsters
You can target monsters on the field and/or in any GY(s), up to the number of monsters in a Mutual Link with this card (Quick Effect); return them to the hand. This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field. If a monster this card points to is destroyed by battle or sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 monster from your hand.
